columns.name: DOMAIN_NAME
columns.description: Database domain where this data is stored.

columns.name: INSERT_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data insert user.

columns.name: INSERT_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of data insert.

columns.name: UPDATE_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data update user.

columns.name: UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of the most recent data update.

columns.name: GTM_TRANSACTION_LINE_GID
columns.description: The GID for the GTM trade transaction line.

columns.name: LICENSE_LINE_GID
columns.description: The GID for the GTM license line.

columns.name: GTM_QUANTITY_TYPE_GID
columns.description: The GID for the GTM quantity qualifier.

columns.name: QUANTITY_VALUE
columns.description: The value of the license line quantity allocated to the trade transaction line.

columns.name: QUANTITY_UOM
columns.description: The unit of measure of the license line quantity allocated to the trade transaction line.

columns.name: GTM_VALUE_QUALIFIER_GID
columns.description: The GID for the GTM value qualifier.

columns.name: LICENSE_EXPIRATION_DATE
columns.description: The expiration date of the license assigned to the trade transaction line.

columns.name: USER_GID
columns.description: The GID for GTM user which assigned the license to the trade transaction line.

columns.name: ASSIGNED_DATE
columns.description: The date that the license is assigned to the trade transaction line.

columns.name: COMMENTS
columns.description: Comments.

columns.name: CURRENCY_VALUE
columns.description: The currency value of the license line assigned to the trade transaction.

columns.name: CURRENCY_VALUE_BASE
columns.description: The currency value in base units of the license line assigned to the trade transaction.

columns.name: CURRENCY_VALUE_CURRENCY_GID
columns.description: The GID for the value currency.

columns.name: GTM_TRANS_LINE_LICENSE_SEQ
columns.description: The sequence number for the license line assigned to the trade transaction.

columns.name: EXCHANGE_RATE_GID
columns.description: The Exchange Rate ID used for value conversion between the license and the trade transaction. It is foreign key reference to EXCHANGE_RATE table.

columns.name: RATE_EXCHANGE_DATE
columns.description: The Exchange Rate date used for value conversion between the license and the trade transaction.

columns.name: GTM_CONTROL_TYPE_GID
columns.description: The control type being released by the license line assigned to the trade transaction.

columns.name: CONTROL_CODE
columns.description: The control code being released by the license line assigned to the trade transaction.

columns.name: GTM_LL_USAGE_SEQUENCE_NO
columns.description: The sequence number of the license line usage.

columns.name: TRANSACTION_DATE
columns.description: Transaction date is set on performing license assignment based on the date qualifier configured on license code option.
